name: grunt-foreman
description: Run foreman start like a boss
readme:
### Install
```javascript
npm install grunt-foreman
```

### Usage
Use as such:
```javascript
grunt.loadNpmModule("grunt-foreman");

grunt.registerTask("serve", ["sass", "coffee", "foreman"]);
```

No need for an entry in `grunt.initConfig({})`.

Enjoy!
